name: Kailash
description:
The great sage goes to Mount Kailash in search of knowledge, but will he be able to find out the truth of the universe and accept his fate

PC, Windows 10, 11 

Controls:

WASD - move

Shift -sprint

Alt - roll

Spacebar - Jump

RMB/LMB/F - fight

 

God controlls:

1 + lmb = golem

2 + lmb drag = invoker

3 + lmb start and lmb end point = wind

WASD - flying

Non-original assets

ALS (advanced locomotion system)
